title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the party control of government when Congress passed legislation in 2014 to repeal the ACA.

For Task A2, the response must explain how that party control could have affected the attempt to repeal the ACA in 2014.

For Task B, the response must explain why a Republican representative following the delegate model of representation might have cast a vote in favor of the ACA bill in 2009 when it was originally passed.

For Task C1, the response must describe how the judicial branch could be used to implement the Republican’s legislative goals despite President Obama’s veto.

For Task C2, the response must explain how this use of the judicial branch might ultimately affect the success of Affordable Care Act.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any five of the tasks set by the question.
